Question
========

Of the 80 participants (30 women, 50 men) in the Quitting Smoking, 40 succeed in indeed quitting smoking. Of the 30 women, 10 manage to quit. How likely is it that someone who has quit is a man?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.5
* 0.6
* 0.75

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.5: Incorrect
* 0.6: Incorrect
* 0.75: Correct
